document: <sentence id="s1" text="We detected 11 novel mutations in li>GJA3, li>GJA8, li>CRYAA, li>CRYBB2, li>CRYGS, li>CRYGA, li>GCNT2, li>CRYGA, and li>MIP; and three previously reported cataract-causing mutations in li>GJA8, li>CRYAA, and li>CRYBB2 The most commonly mutated genes were those coding for negative regulation of cell-matrix adhesion junctions and crystallin proteins.">
